text: Vaughn Dale Armstrong (born July 7, 1950) is an American actor. Armstrong is noted for having portrayed many different characters in the Star Trek franchise, across all Star Trek television series except for the original, Star Trek: Discovery and Star Trek: Picard, including the recurring character Admiral Maxwell Forrest in Star Trek: Enterprise. By the time of a 2003 interview, Armstrong had played eleven different characters. ==References== ==External links== * * Interview with Vaughn Armstrong & The Enterprise Blues Band on Slice of SciFi * Vaughn Armstrong(Aveleyman) Category:American male television actors Category:American male stage actors Category:American male film actors Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sonora, California
title: Vaughn Armstrong
